Learning_Security_CategoryObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Learning_Security_CategoryObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Learning_Security_CategoryObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Identifies security categories using unique references for updates. Leave blank when creating security categories. For update, the IDs corresponding to security categories.

Learning_Security_Category_Data.description: The Name of the security category which acts as it's ID. This value must be unique.
Learner user groups who can access content that you secure to this segment.

description: Contains detailed information about the security category
